original_text: For if a woman does not cover her head, she might as well have her hair cut off; but if it is a disgrace for a woman to have her hair cut off or her head shaved, then she should cover her head.
korean_text: 만일 여자가 머리를 가리지 않거든 깎을 것이요 만일 깎거나 미는 것이 여자에게 부끄러움이 되거든 가릴지니라

sentences.original_text: For if a woman does not cover her head
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 만약 여자가 자기 머리를 덮지 않으면

sentences.original_text: she might as well have her hair cut off
but if it is a disgrace for a woman
to have her hair cut off or her head shaved
then she should cover her head
